product_name: Patagonia Dynamite Duo Insulated Reversible Jacket - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Patagonia Dynamite Duo Insulated reversible jacket for girls provides options: the shell side provides slick protection while the furry fleece side is warm and cozy. Reversible design sports a protective recycled polyester shell on one side and cuddly soft fleece on the other; compressible insulation provides added comfort and warmth. Shell fabric is treated with Durable Water Repellent for added protection from rain and snow. The Patagonia Dynamite Duo Insulated reversible jacket has handwarmer pockets on both sides and a chest pocket on the slick side. 3-panel hood is comfortable and stays put; chinguard protects from zipper when jacket is zipped all the way up. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia. Closeout.
short_description: The Patagonia Dynamite Duo Insulated reversible jacket for girls provides options: the shell side provides slick protection while the furry fleece side is warm and cozy.
